titleInfo.title: NESMITH v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE HABEAS PETITION BE DENIED AND DISMISSED AND THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE, ETC.. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE L. titleInfo.title: NESMITH v. COMMON PLEAS COURT OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED; THE PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS DENIED. A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHALL NOT ISSUE SINCE FOR THE REASONS SET FORTH IN THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION A REASONABLE JURIST COULD NOT CONCLUDE THAT THE COURT WOULD BEINCORRECT IN DENYING AND DISMISSING THE SECTION 2254 PETIITON.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE JOHN P. FULLAM ON 1/13/11. 1/14/11 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED TO PRO SE AND E-MAILED TO AFFRONTI.(lvj, )
